5 Stunden Spielzeit ... vielleicht ... 10 Matches gesamt per Lobby...

Dabei bin ich Level 7, habe genau EINEN Killer der inzwischen ZWEI Perks hat (grünen Crap).
Matchmaking als Killer dauert gemessen im Durchschnitt ca. 11 - 19 Minuten für rund 5-10 Minuten Spielzeit.

Dabei treffe ich als Killer (ZWEI Perks, keine rare oder ultrarare) auf 4 Spieler mit 4 (VIER!) Ultrarare Perks die binnen 4 Minuten kurz vor Portalöffnung sind ... das ging mir inzwischen von den 10 Games rund 5-6 Mal so ...

Uninteressant! Matchmaking is hart fürn Arsch - als Killer gegen 4 (am besten Premade) highend Survivors hast du schlicht und ergreifend keine Chance ... das Spiel nervt in diesem Studium extrem!

Game requires WAY too much time to be comfortable with your perk setup on your characters. You might need a different perk from 4 different characters and some of them might be locked behind a paywall. Once you do have all the characters that have the perks that you want, now you have to level all of them to either 30, 35, or 40 in order to unlock the perk for a CHANCE to unlock it on another character in a timely manner. This is just completely bogus as it could take you 100 hours of playing a build that sucks and that doesn't help you just to get to something you think you might like only for it to be just ok so you want to try another build, but that just requires another 100 hours. It's not fun. It's not fun to run perks that you don't like for that long just to feel decent about yourself.

Killers have a huge advantage right now with the lack of pallets to drop on them to break up the chase. I swear there are times where I only see 4 pallets in the entire map. I shouldn't have to camp in a single area just to be able to use a pallet for my protection. You can hop over ledges as well, but this is just a deathwish as the killers will always hit you as you are climbing over and even if they don't, all they have to do is walk 3 feet to the side to get around the wall and that doesn't matter since killers are so much faster than you are that they catch up to you in no time. They have a two perks that every killer would run if they weren't locked behind a paywall called Ruin and BBQ and Chill. It basically screws up all survivors on the map when they try to work on generators and if you DARE complain about the perks, you will get called names by all the circle jerking killer mains in the game that all claim you just suck that you can't outsmart them when using those perks, yet they all run them if they can, so who's the bigger idiot here? The people mad about perks that make it harder for survivors to do the one thing they are suppose to do (gens) or the killers that run those perks so they can have an even bigger advantage than they already do? Killer mains are a sad bunch of individuals that are never happy with anything in the game cause they can't just one shot everyone and automatically win.

When trying to escape from a killer as a survivor, you have few options. You can try to use pallets to stun the killer which is nice when you get it off, but lag means you can still be hit when you shouldn't have been so you just screwed yourself by timing the pallet drop. There's a few perks in the game that give you a speed increase, but once again they just delay your death. If you try to stealth away from the killers, you can't do that either cause most objects in the game aren't big enough to hind you perfectly when using them for cover. If you run at all, you're dead as the game lets the killer see scratch marks they can follow to find you. You have to run if a killer sees you as it's the only way to get some distance and maybe see another day, but running gives you away. You see the dilemma here? There's a few perks that help with scratch marks, but only after you have completed a generator. There's one that will lower the amount of time scratch marks show up by 3 seconds, but that doesn't mean anything when scratch marks stay for 10 SECONDS! As a survivor, you are suppose to be prey, but that doesn't mean the game has to make you feel useless. I shouldn't have to run Decisive Blow (lets you stab/stun the killer when you get picked up for 5 seconds) just to feel good about myself.
I find this game really amusing and fun to play, very easy to get into

Overall would recommend this game to those who love multiplayer co-op games and horror genre and those who want to experience unique gameplay. Here's a list of pros and cons of this game :
Pros :
Many playable characters and perks to try out open an opportunity to play different builds ( won't get boring too quick ).
You can play with your friends for a reward against a killer or create a kill your friends lobby and play for fun.
There is quite a lot of room to grow your skill and strategical knowledge of the game.
The game is quite fun even if you are playing solo ( varies if you get a bad team or toxic face camping killer / toxic t-bagging flashlight clicking god-loop abusing 5000 hour of playtime SWF OoO party).
Wonderful sounds and immersive music to get you really in to the game.
Devs slowly try to balance the game for both sides ( though there's still a lot of room for improvement ).
Fine graphics for such a game.
The game is pretty straight forward, no need to spend massive amounts of time to learn it, is enjoyable from the start.
CONS... oh no... there's quite a lot.. :
Let's start with the connection issues, ping importancy and some CRAZY game breaking things which dedicated servers might happily provide you with like : you getting hit through a pallet by killer or when you're vaulting windows and get hit while you're meters away from the killer on your screen and etc. 
Searching for a lobby often takes quite a while, 10-20+ minutes, you can get quite irritated that when you finally load in to a game after waiting for 30 minutes to find a lobby just for someone to randomly dc at the start of the game to start searching all over again.
Pay to play DLC's + battle pass and donate only skins, I think this one speaks for itself, if you want to unlock all the playable characters it won't go easy on your wallet, now that they added battle pass to make even more money not talking about how much they earn from people buying in-game cosmetics.
Constant grind, you need to spend a lot of hours on this game to unlock and max all the meta perks not talking about all the perks, p3's... for many this might be quite a tedious and boring process and many will think it's not worth the time.
Finally one of the if not the biggest con is : TOXIC community of this game, honestly one of the worst communities I've ever seen in a game and it is going from someone who played 1000+ hours of dota 2 before, IT IS THAT BAD. Just so you have an idea I will give you a few examples of toxicity in my previous dbd matches : if you get seen by a survivor teammate while going in to a locker, they 70% of the time will wait for the killer and point at your locker just to screw you over, steal your loot in front of you just as you've searched a chest, leave through exit gate during endgame collapse at the last few seconds when they clearly know you are waiting on a hatch so you can't escape and get killed by the entity, leave you dying on your first hook for no reason or sometimes if you are lucky enough you can stumble on a toxic swf party doing no gens but trying to get their teammate ( you ) get killed and not unhooking you purposefully.
AND don't forget that you might verse a toxic face camping killer that will tunnel you whole game even right after someone unhooked you or slug you as a last person for 3 minutes and constantly doing and cancelling mori animation. there's lots and lots of toxicity in this game..
AND yes, the game is survivor sided.

I like it. I used to play a lot on PS4 but I've since switched to PC. It runs a hell of a lot smoother here than it does on PS4, hardly any frame drops at all, which is nice. 

One thing that is bothering me is how long it takes to get into a game. It's a popular game but it can take over 10 minutes to find a match as a killer, which is a big problem.
 
The community is just as salty as ever. I played 4 matches here so far, using a killer I'd never played before (bottom rank by the way) and I'm "getting banned" I'm a "camper" a "tunneler" etc etc. Other players telling me how I should be playing and cursing me because I don't abide by their personal rules. They don't give you the chance to learn how the killers play before they're frothing at the mouth.

To anyone on the fence about this game because they like the thought of playing a killer against actual human intelligence rather than some made for purpose AI, you will be disappointed. The survivors you will usually play against are witless, whiney, sacks of carrots that will cry foul every time you do something they dislike (such as hit them, hook them or exist in their general vicinity)

To anyone else, the game is fun and worth your time, just make sure you have health insurance because that much salt will cause a coronary heart disease.

Честно говоря, даже не знаю, что и писать. Вроде игра и bombeznaya такая штучка (что стоит играть в нее с друзьями и орать вместе с ними), а с другой стороны я столько нервов въебал в это, что страшно даже. Особенно если играешь за Убийцу против надроченных сурвов, это вообще кошмар. Плохо то, конечно, что в основном персонажей для игры ты будешь покупать за real money, а кошельки-то не резиновые, хоть DLCшки вроде и не такие дорогие. Но радует то, что ты можешь покупать (за исключением отдельных элементов кастомизации) за обычную игровую валюту. Также в этой игре можно найти много хороших (и не очень) людей, с которыми времяпрепровождение станет еще интереснее, я уверяю. 
RATING: 8.4/10 токсичных ублюдков с фонарем.

A ideia do jogo é extremamente boa,assim também como executado,as músicas são um ponto bem forte,sem contar que agora estão mudando a música de chase de todos os killers,não podemos reclamar das dlc também pois os melhores assassinos e as habilidades de outros sobreviventes,são de graça,e se tem um que é pago ele,as vezes a habilidade dele fica de graça por moedas que pode se ganhar jogando,é extremamente divertido,tem muitos erros como hitbox muito longa,servidores não dedicados resultando em lag de vez em quando,erros de habilidades as vezes,exemplo(dead hard)de um impulso pra frente e nesse período de tempo não leva dano algum,mas as vezes mesmo usando a habilidade,enquanto ela está ativa,leva dano,não é só porque é meu segundo jogo favorito que não posso levar os error em considerasão,a comunidade também é ruim,mas isso não é culpa do jogo,também o estilo de jogar de algumas pessoas exemplos:camperar,tunnelar,etc(temos que levar em consideração que isso também não é culpa dos produtores).Resumindo,o jogo tem seus erros,mas qual não tem,a comunidade é meio ruim e o estilo de jogar de alguns jogadores 
também é,mas da pra se divertir muitas(MUITAS MESMO!)horas com esse joguinho.
(edit:também esqueci de mencionar que este jogo tem crossovers incríveis como em stranger things,hallowen,a hora do pesadelo,panico,etc.É muito legal jogar com seu personagem favorito no seu JOGO favorito,um ponto muito positivo).
